intents.name: navigate.next
intents.description: the user wishes to move to the next screen or step in the current process

intents.name: accept
intents.description: an affirmative answer, usually to a question posed by the system.

intents.name: command.exit
intents.description: the user wishes to close the app or cancel the current operation

intents.name: command.undo
intents.description: the user wishes to undo the last operation

intents.name: request.select
intents.description: the user is choosing a specificy item from a list of search results or any list displayed on-screen

slots.name: number
slots.description: the index of the item being selected. note that natural language is typically 1-indexed.

intents.name: navigate.back
intents.description: the user wishes to move back to the previous screen or step in the current process

intents.name: request.help
intents.description: the user needs help with the content currently displayed or the app in general

intents.name: greet
intents.description: a casual greeting from the user to open the interaction or ensure that the app is listening

intents.name: reject
intents.description: a negative answer, usually to a question posed by the system.
